Controls randomness: Lowering results in: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.
An alternative to sampling with temperat: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.
